item.title: About me
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Leiming Dong)
item.description: Forest genetic improvement is a time-consuming and labor-intensive work, and at present, the improvement level of the main timber species in China lags behind that of developed countries. The use of state-of-the-art technology can speed up the improvement of economic traits and, combined with reasonable cultivation and management programs, can satisfy people’s needs for forest products to the maximum. The core purpose of forest genetic improvement is to maximize genetic gain.
